src:
Jadwal Bentrok, Liverpool Turunkan Dua Tim Berbeda di Hari yang Sama?
01 Nov 2019, 05:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Raksasa Premier League, Liverpool dikabarkan tengah mempertimbangkan ide 'gila' guna mengakali bentroknya jadwal laga Carabao Cup dengan Piala Dunia Antarklub.
Kemenangan lewat adu penalti atas Arsenal dini hari kemarin membuat Liverpool berhak lolos ke perempat final. Di babak ini, The Reds sudah dipastikan bakal berjumpa dengan Aston Villa.
Laga di kandang Aston Villa rencananya akan digelar pada 17 atau 18 Desember waktu setempat. Masalahnya, tanggal ini bentrok dengan jadwal tanding Jordan Henderson cs di pentas Piala Dunia Antarklub yang digelar di Qatar.
text:
Clash Schedule, Liverpool Reduce Two Different Teams on the Same Day?
Nov 1, 2019, 05:18 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League giants Liverpool are reportedly considering a 'crazy' idea to outsmart the clash of the Carabao Cup match schedule with the Club World Cup.
Winning on penalties over Arsenal yesterday morning makes Liverpool entitled to qualify for the quarter-finals. In this round, the Reds are certain to meet Aston Villa.
The match at Aston Villa is planned to be held on December 17 or 18 local time. The problem is, this date clashed with the match schedule Jordan Henderson cs in the Club World Cup stage which was held in Qatar.
